name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Senior Automation Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in UI Automation and API Testing. Proficient in utilizing **Selenium**, **JUnit**, and **JavaScript**, alongside a rich understanding of **HTML**, **CSS**, and **DOM** for effective test automation solutions. My development background includes frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and programming languages such as **Java**, **C#**, and **Golang**, ensuring comprehensive coverage of both automation and application development. 
 
I have led teams in Agile environments, implementing Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices and quality assurance methodologies that align with compliance standards. Additionally, my strong foundation in cloud services, particularly **AWS** and **Azure**, complements my technical skills, optimizing the testing processes across distributed systems. I also have hands-on experience with version control using **Git** and automated CI/CD pipelines, which enhances the delivery of high-performance solutions.
